EmailTemplate.name: MSF Confirm Access - FactSet
EmailTemplate.subject: IHS Markit Customer Care Case {!Case.CaseNumber} - Request for Access to Markit Securities Finance Data over FactSet
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear FactSet Validation Team,
Please can you enable access for the below user(s) as follows:
User Information: Contact(s) Name: Company Name: Email Address(es):
Product Access: - Markit Securities Finance - Equity Americas - Individual Access - Markit Securities Finance - Equity Europe - Individual Access - Markit Securities Finance - Equity Asia - Individual Access - Markit Securities Finance - Global Coverage - Individual Access - Markit Securities Finance Contributor Data - Individual Access
Access Type: - Trial Access Start Date: DD/MMM/YYYY End Date: DD/MMM/YYYY
- Purchase Access
Please can you confirm by replying to this email when this request has been processed?
Please do not hesitate to contact us if you require any further information. Thank You.
Kind regards, {!Case.OwnerFirstName} {!Case.OwnerLastName} Markit Securities Finance UK: +44 808 120 2344 | US: +1 866 861 6171 | HK: +852 800 964 146 msf-support@markit.com
{!Case.Thread_Id}
